meaningMnemonic: Sometimes even though you're very much awake and <kanji>alive</kanji> you need to <kanji>sleep</kanji> for a little bit, so you take a <vocabulary>nap</vocabulary>. But you're not dead! You're totally alive, so let's hope no one thinks you're doing anything but <vocabulary>dozing off</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
